page.title: 07SECTION 4 - POOLEY BRIDGE
page.content: CLUBS - Women's Institute meets the 3rd Thursday in each month. Wednesday Club - fortnightly meetings of the over 60s. Mother's Union - members from Barton, Pooley Bridge & Martindale parishes. Ullswater Discussion Group - monthly meetings of farmers from a wide area meet at the Sun Hotel to discuss farming problems. This has grown out of the former Shepherd's Meet. Town's Holiday Committee raise funds and provide a Christmas Party & presents for the children. In former days also organised a village outing during the summer, hence the Holiday in the title COMMUNICATIONS - 3 Public Telephone Kiosks. Postal Service, collection of mail twice daily a.m. & p.m. morning delivery. Automatic telephone exchange.
